body_html:
@mkalininait The main issue is that I need a column with a unique field to identify conferences. The title of the conference is not suitable for that. (Because you won't be allowed to change the title at all.) Do you mind to add a column to the Google Docs with a uniq code? For instance : 2017001, 2017002 . I think you should be able to let Google do the counting. The '2017' part would be the season when we offer the conference.
And in that case, opposed to what I asked yesterday, you can leave the year in the conference title, and we won't need a separate column with the year.
Would this be complicating things for you?
